data.eml:eml: Anagyrus Howard (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) parasitoids of the invasive Delottococcus aberiae (De Lotto) (Hemiptera: Pseudococcidae) from South Africa, with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guerrieri, Emilio, Cascone, Pasquale (2018): Anagyrus Howard (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) parasitoids of the invasive Delottococcus aberiae (De Lotto) (Hemiptera: Pseudococcidae) from South Africa, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4531 (3): 374-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.3.3
